src:
Jelang Kualifikasi Piala Asia Timnas U-19 Ganti Satu Pemain
05 Nov 2019, 17:27 by Indra Virgiantara


Jelang Kualifikasi Piala Asia Timnas U-19 Ganti Satu Pemain

KBRN, Jakarta : Tim nasional Indonesia U-19 jelang kualifikasi Piala Asia 2020 harus mengganti satu pemainnya yang mengalami cedera. Pemain yang diganti pelatih timnas U-19 adalah Muhammad Fadhil Aditya Akshah yang digantikan Fadilah Nur Rahman.
Hal itu diungkapkan Fakhri saat konferensi pers di Hotel Century, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019)."Sampai persiapan terakhir 22 pemain dalam kondisi sehat, siap untuk bermain semaksimal mungkin, hanya ada satu pemain yang kami harus ganti yaitu Fadil yang cedera dalam latihan terakhir cedera, kami terpaksa harus mengganti dengan Fadilah," terangnya.Â Timnas Garuda Muda tergabung dalam grup K Piala Asia U-19 2020, dipertandingan pertama Indonesia akan menghadapi Timor Leste di Stadion Madya, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam. Dua hari kemudian melawan Hongkong, dan dilaga terakhir bertemu Korea Utara pada 10 November.
text:
Ahead of the Asian Cup Qualifiers U-19 national team replace one player
05 Nov 2019, 17:27 by Indra Virgiantara


Ahead of the Asian Cup Qualifiers U-19 national team replace one player

KBRN, Jakarta: Indonesian U-19 national team ahead of the 2020 Asian Cup qualifiers must replace one player who suffered an injury. The player who was replaced by the U-19 national team coach was Muhammad Fadhil Aditya Akshah who was replaced by Fadilah Nur Rahman.
This was revealed by Fakhri during a press conference at Century Hotel, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019). "Until the final preparation of 22 players in good health, ready to play as much as possible, there was only one player we had to replace, namely Fadil who was injured. in the last injury training, we were forced to replace with Fadilah, "he explained. Garuda Muda National Team joined in group K U-19 Asian Cup 2020, the first match Indonesia will face Timor Leste at the Madya Stadium, Wednesday (11/06/2019) night. Two days later against Hong Kong, the last match was to meet North Korea on November 10.
